name: Chalet 1
description: Escape to our warm and inviting Chalet 1, a perfect retreat for families and church groups seeking tranquility and comfort. Nestled in the heart of Zimbabwe's stunning landscape, this chalet offers a serene environment to relax and reconnect with loved ones. Enjoy modern amenities and a cozy atmosphere that feels like a home away from home.
